mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT A.BBS_SEQ , A.BBS_ID , A.BBS_GRP_SEQ , A.BBS_GRP_IDX , A.WRTR_ID , A.WRTR_NM , A.USR_DEFINE1 , A.TITLE , A.INQ_CNT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.WRTR_DD, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WRTR_DD , TO_CHAR(TO_TIMESTAMP(A.LST_UPD_DDTM, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS LST_UPD_DDTM , A.INQ_CNT , B.USE_YN AS IMG_YN FROM BOARD A LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTCH B ON (A.BBS_SEQ = B.BBS_SEQ)
AND (A.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%' OR A.CONTN LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%')
ORDER BY A.BBS_SEQ

SELECT BBS_SEQ , BBS_ID , BBS_GRP_SEQ , BBS_GRP_IDX , BBS_DEPTH , TITLE , CONTN , WRTR_ID , WRTR_NM , WRTR_IP , WRTR_DD , WRTR_TM , USR_DEFINE1 , USR_DEFINE2 , LST_UPD_USR_ID , LST_UPD_USR_NM , LST_UPD_DDTM , USE_YN FROM BOARD WHERE BBS_SEQ = #{bbsSeq}
mapper.insert:
SELECT MAX(BBS_SEQ) AS bbsSeq FROM BOARD
INSERT INTO BOARD ( BBS_ID , BBS_GRP_SEQ , BBS_GRP_IDX , BBS_DEPTH , TITLE , CONTN , WRTR_ID , WRTR_NM , WRTR_DD , WRTR_TM , LST_UPD_DDTM ) VALUES ( #{bbsId} , (SELECT COALESCE(MAX(BBS_GRP_SEQ)+1, 1) FROM BOARD WHERE BBS_ID = #{bbsId}) , #{bbsGrpIdx} , 1 , #{title} , #{contn} , #{wrtrId} , #{wrtrNm} , to_char(now(),'YYYYMMDD') , to_char(now(),'HH24MISS') , to_char(now(),'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') )
mapper.select: SELECT BBS_SEQ , BBS_ID , ATTACH_FILE_NM , FILE_PATH , SAVE_FILE_NM , ATTACH_FILE_SEQ FROM ATTCH WHERE BBS_SEQ = #{bbsSeq}

/* ReqBoardMapper.selectNoticeList */ SELECT tdb.* , (SELECT ARRAY_TO_STRING(ARRAY_AGG(attach_file_nm), ',') FROM tb_dpm_attch tda WHERE tda.bbs_seq = tdb.bbs_seq) AS attach_file_nm FROM BOARD tdb WHERE bbs_id = #{bbsId} AND 'Y' = EXISTS(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_dpm_menu WHERE menu_id = '1' AND auth_cd = #{authCd}) ORDER BY TO_TIMESTAMP(wrtr_dd || ' ' || wrtr_tm, 'YYYYMMDD HH24MISS') DESC LIMIT 5
